name: Dark - Google Translate
description: My eyes get tired from all the white web-pages, so I don't mind taking the time to make them dark themed. Black/blue/gray-ish Google Translator, that works with "any" website ending, such as: .com. I think I've covered everything, yet that would be close to impossible, but enough to not get blinded. Please enjoy and use it as you like, and feel free to change anything: colors, background, etc. Thanks! ♥

user.name: Sara Svesar
user.about:
Casual programmer studying C#, who also likes writing in CSS and JavaScript. ★
I like to play games and draw on my spare time! ♥ Cat lover ♥

additional_info:
Change Log: 02/10/2018 
- Fixed the colors for the drop-down menus! 
- Updated some classes to work with new Google updates. 
- Bug fixes, such as some icons not displaying correctly.
